metadata.title: CVE-2017-7502 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Null pointer dereference vulnerability in NSS since 3.24.0 was found whenserver receives empty SSLv2 messages resulting into denial of service byremote attacker.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-7502` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libnss3 - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libnss3-1d - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libnss3-nssdb - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
libnss3-tools - 2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.16.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: nss package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:3.28.4-0ubuntu0.16.04.2').
